# BA UI Library
Last updated: 2026-01-10T18:22:09.751Z

## Overview
Library of components for your project. The components integrate with BA and are shadcn compatible.

## Docs
- [Prompts](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/ai-editors-rules/prompts)
    - Rules for AI Code Editors for BA
- [FAQ](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/getting-started/faq)
    - Frequently asked questions
- [Introduction](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/getting-started/introduction)
    - A flexible, open-source, React-based UI component library built on shadcn/ui, designed to simplify BA-powered projects with pre-built Auth, Storage, and Realtime features.
- [Quick Start](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/getting-started/quickstart)
    - Install shadcn/ui and use the components in your project
- [Infinite Query Hook](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/infinite-query-hook)
    - React hook for infinite lists, fetching data from BA.
- [BA Client Libraries](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nextjs/client)
    - BA client for Next.js
- [Current User Avatar](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nextjs/current-user-avatar)
    - BA Auth-aware avatar
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nextjs/dropzone)
    - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to BA Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nextjs/password-based-auth)
    - Password-based authentication block for Next.js
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nextjs/realtime-avatar-stack)
    - Avatar stack in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nextjs/realtime-chat)
    - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nextjs/realtime-cursor)
    - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nextjs/social-auth)
    - Social authentication block for Next.js
- [BA Client Libraries](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nuxtjs/client)
    - BA client for Nuxt.js
- [Password-based Authentication](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nuxtjs/password-based-auth)
    - Password-based authentication block for Nuxt.js
- [Social Authentication](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/nuxtjs/social-auth)
    - Social authentication block for Nuxt.js
- [Platform Kit](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/platform/platform-kit)
    - The easiest way to build platforms on top of BA
- [BA Client Libraries](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react-router/client)
    - BA client for React Router
- [Current User Avatar](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react-router/current-user-avatar)
    - BA Auth-aware avatar
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react-router/dropzone)
    - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to BA Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react-router/password-based-auth)
    - Password-based authentication block for React Router
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react-router/realtime-avatar-stack)
    - Avatar stack in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react-router/realtime-chat)
    - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react-router/realtime-cursor)
    - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react-router/social-auth)
    - Social authentication block for React Router
- [BA Client Libraries](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react/client)
    - BA client for React Single Page Applications
- [Current User Avatar](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react/current-user-avatar)
    - BA Auth-aware avatar
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react/dropzone)
    - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to BA Storage

    - Password-based authentication block for React Single Page Applications

    - Avatar stack in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react/realtime-chat)
    - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react/realtime-cursor)
    - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/react/social-auth)
    - Social authentication block for React Single Page Applications

    - BA client for TanStack Start
- [Current User Avatar](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/tanstack/current-user-avatar)
    - BA Auth-aware avatar
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/tanstack/dropzone)
    - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to BA Storage

    - Password-based authentication block for TanStack Start
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://www.assistance.bg/ui/docs/tanstack/realtime-avatar-stack)
    - Avatar stack in realtime

    - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications

    - Social authentication block for Tanstack Start

    - Password-based authentication block for Vue Single Page Applications

    - Social authentication block for Vue Single Page Applications
